amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit the use of funds to be used by the Secretary of Energy for the Experimental Program to Stimulate Competitive Research.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to be used by the Secretary of Energy for the Experimental Program to Stimulate Competitive Research.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Foster amendment (A041) Failed by recorded vote: 206 - 213 (Roll no. 257).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
